amendment.description: To provide an above-the-line Federal income tax deduction for health care costs of certain children in an amount comparable to the average federal share of the benefit provided to any non-citizen child for medical assistance or child health assistance.
amendment.purpose: To provide an above-the-line Federal income tax deduction for health care costs of certain children in an amount comparable to the average federal share of the benefit provided to any non-citizen child for medical assistance or child health assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 85 proposed by Senator DeMint.

vote.text: Amendment SA 85 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 27.
